svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 5 2018
October 5 2018
title: "October 5, 2018" date: "2018-10-05"

• Moloch DAO , an experiment to get projects to coordinate around funding Eth infrastructure
Moloch DAO , an experiment to get projects to coordinate around funding Eth infrastructure
• Enterprise Ethereum Alliance and Hyperledger join each other’s group as associate members. Because as Bob Summerwill always says, “ EEA
is a standards body. Hyperledger is an umbrella for open source blockchain projects .”
Enterprise Ethereum Alliance and Hyperledger join each other’s group as associate members. Because as Bob Summerwill always says, “ EEA is
a standards body. Hyperledger is an umbrella for open source blockchain projects .”
• Blockchain Gaming Alliance to develop best practices and standards
Blockchain Gaming Alliance to develop best practices and standards
Governance and Standards
• EIP1459 : Node discovery via DNS
EIP1459 : Node discovery via DNS
• ERC1462 : basic security token
ERC1462 : basic security token
• ERC1470 : smart contract weakness classification
ERC1470 : smart contract weakness classification
• Vlad Zamfir: Blockchain Governance 101 , his call to think about how we want which of 5 governance scenarios we prefer. He followed up
with his declaration to fight against 3 of the 5 , though it was relatively clear after the first article.
Vlad Zamfir: Blockchain Governance 101 , his call to think about how we want which of 5 governance scenarios we prefer. He followed up
Project Updates
• Numerai announces Erasure Protocol using NMR , a “p2p, decentralized data marketplace for predictions.” Create a track record of
predictions that people can buy but you can get slashed if they’re wrong.
Numerai announces Erasure Protocol using NMR , a “p2p, decentralized data marketplace for predictions.” Create a track record of
• Spankchain’s stable USDtoken BOOTY (collateralized using its native token) goes live today .
Spankchain’s stable USDtoken BOOTY (collateralized using its native token) goes live today .

What’s coming in Augur v2 . Also topical index funds , eg Lebron James
• Gnosis DutchX code is deployed and pilot to begin. Also: GnosisX had zero possible winners submitted , so what they’re going to do now
to encourage #buidl
Gnosis DutchX code is deployed and pilot to begin. Also: GnosisX had zero possible winners submitted , so what they’re going to do now to
encourage #buidl

If you appreciate this newsletter, thank ConsenSys
This newsletter is made possible by ConsenSys , which is perpetually hiring if you’re interested.
I own Week In Ethereum. As such, editorial control has always been 100% me. If you’re unhappy with editorial decisions, feel free to
tweet at me.
Shameless self-promotion
Most of what I link to I tweet first: @evan_van_ness
